event.title: were awarded to the Duke of York in 1641

data.event: The first land grant for the area were awarded to the Duke of York in 1641.

event.title: 1731, longtime area resident and businessman John Justis purchased

data.event: In 1731, longtime area resident and businessman John Justis purchased 100 acres (0.40 km2) and several years later the streets of a town called Newport-Ayre were laid out.

event.title: several years later the streets of a town called Newport-Ayre were laid out
